translation.en: Do you know where we are?
I'm having a hard time remembering.

translation.ja: 奇妙ね 財布もない
奇妙ね 財布もない 貝殻以外は身分証すらない

translation.en: I mean, there's nothing on me besides this shell that I woke up holding.
translation.ja: 貝殻以外は身分証すらない

translation.en: I found it next to me on the beach.
It's a lot more useful than this shell.
So, we don't know who or where we are.
I don't know me. -And I don't know you. -Exactly.
translation.ja: 自分もあなたも知らない
そうね 知らないわ

translation.en: Listen, okay? I'll put this shell down.
Why don't you put the knife down, okay? You clearly don't know how to hold one.
translation.ja: ナイフを置いて持ち方が変よ

translation.en: How would you know a thing like that, huh?
Give the knife back to me.
We have company. We shouldn't be waving--
Around the corner, there are others.
translation.ja: 向こうに他の人も居る

translation.en: -[man 1] Okay, let's rest. -[woman 2] Yeah, that's good.
All right, just take a little sip for now.
translation.ja: 少しだけ飲んで中身は少ないの

translation.en: -Those things don't have that much milk. -Thanks.
translation.ja: 少しだけ飲んで中身は少ないの どうも

translation.en: Nobody can remember anything at all about how we woke up here?
translation.ja: ここまでの経緯を皆忘れてる

translation.en: It's not possible that we all have amnesia.
Okay, well, we may be on, I don't know, some kind of work trip or something?
Since our clothes are all so similar.
I don't think this is team building.
Then, what? I mean, our plane went down?
Ten people walk away from something like that without any injuries?
translation.ja: 十人も無傷でいられる？

translation.en: There's no floating luggage around anywhere out in the water.
-There's no dead bodies. -Dead bodies don't float...
translation.ja: 死体も 死体は沈む

translation.en: All I'm saying is, it doesn't add up.
Say it again. Doesn't add up.
Makes you feel better? Doesn't add up.
translation.ja: 気が済んだ？おかしいな

translation.en: Can I see something on your shirt?
No. I just want to check out your tag.
Come on, all of us wearing the same tag? Same label?
My name's Cooper. I don't remember that at all.
translation.ja: 俺はクーパーか覚えてない

translation.en: -[Moses] What's your name? -[chuckling] Mine's, um, Blair.
So, do any of you guys want to head out with me?
I just want to figure this thing out.
Where we are, who we are? You know, little details like that.
translation.ja: この場所と私達が誰なのか

translation.en: Maybe we just learned our names.
Maybe you did figure out our names.
Good for you. But I already have one picked out for you.
translation.ja: あなたの呼び名も考えた

translation.en: I'm sure it's the same one I've got for you.
I'll come with you. See what's what.
Well, I guess I'll see you guys later.
[Donovan] We found something in every spot where someone was lying.
translation.ja: 倒れた場所に物がある

translation.en: Yeah. Thank God we came when we did.
A little bit longer, that tide would've came in.
-[Donovan] This is not a coincidence. -Tell me about it.
translation.ja: 偶然じゃない 続けて

translation.en: What are we even doing out here?
Maybe we're dead and this is heaven.
Time for the gun show. What a surprise.
find some fresh water and shelter.
translation.ja: 水と寝床を確保しよう

translation.en: You know, actually, I don't think I can deal with that other chick again.
I'mma head back, hang with the others. It's too hot for me.
Yeah, well, thanks for not making me do the same.
-Where do you want to go? -Let's go that way.
All I'm saying... is we don't know that aliens didn't drop us here just to harvest our organs.
translation.ja: 宇宙人が臓器目的で捕まえたのかも

translation.en: Does anyone have any visible injuries or pain?

translation.ja: いえ トラウマは違うか

translation.en: you want to sit with us?
I vaguely remember having a strong dislike for optimists.
translation.ja: 楽観主義は嫌いだった

translation.en: How about I say a word, and then you all say the first thing that comes to mind? Maybe that'll reveal something.
translation.ja: 何か言うから浮かんだ事を言ってみて

translation.en: Come on! Why'd you start with food? I'm starving.
Let's just crack open some coconuts over there.
What do you think about all those people?
Hmm, checking each other out, trying to mate based on sexual attraction.
translation.ja: 互いの確認魅力的な相手を狙う

translation.en: And me, an intellectual, silently judging them.
translation.ja: 私は知的だから静かに判断してる

translation.en: You kinda don't say anything at all.
-[fire crackling] -[Hayden] Yeah. Here we go. That's it.
We should be careful about spending too much time in the sun.
translation.ja: 太陽は浴びすぎると危険よ

translation.en: I haven't seen a single plane since we woke up here, -so good luck with that. -What?
translation.ja: 飛行機なんて一度も通ってない

translation.en: I just wanna spend the rest of my days on this deserted island in peace, if you don't mind.
translation.ja: 残りの人生を島で平和に過ごしたいの

translation.en: Flirting with each other somewhere. Who cares?
-Let's go swimming. -I'm not moping, I'm tanning.
translation.ja: 落ち込むな泳ごう 日光浴中よ

translation.en: Come to help you guys. -[Cooper panting]

translation.ja: 手伝うわよ 見ろよ

translation.en: Come on, you losers! Let's go swimming!
We're in paradise. Let's live a little.
[Donovan] Watch out, I'm gonna get you! [laughs] Yeah!
I'm gonna stay here and finish this, I think. I don't know if I can swim.
translation.ja: 俺は残る泳げるか忘れた

translation.en: ♪ All the guys All around the world'll say it ♪
Well, at least now we have some fresh water.

translation.ja: 食べ物もだ 完璧ね

translation.en: -We could probably live here if we had to. -Yeah, we could.
translation.ja: 生活できるな そうね

translation.en: Maybe we shouldn't tell the others about this.
I just think it should be our little secret for now.
You know, great minds and all that. -[chuckles] -Plus, you never know.
translation.ja: 偉人の考えは同じ先の不安もある

translation.en: So it's the whole survival of the fittest kinda thing, huh?
Well, I mean, you are pretty fit.
Come on! Hey! I said no.
-[Hayden] What? Guys, get out! -[Taylor] Help! Somebody, help! Help!
translation.ja: 誰か助けて 早く出て

translation.en: -Come on! I need a hand! -Hey! Help her!
-Fuck! -[Cooper] Hey, come back to the beach!
[Hayden] No, hey. Mason, are you okay?
What was it? What was it?
[Hayden] You okay? What the fuck happened?
The guy with the long hair.
He went out swimming, so we all joined him, you know, just for some fun.
translation.ja: 泳ぎ出すから皆で遊んでた

translation.en: A shark or a fucking who knows what.
[Cooper] Doesn't matter, the guy's dead. Almost got Blair, too.
translation.ja: 奴は死んだブレアもギリギリだ

translation.en: Where'd you get all that stuff? That bitch find it?
You know, Chase isn't a bitch, she's just--
translation.ja: チェイスを悪く言うな

translation.en: She just happens to find all that survival gear?
Y'all know what I'm talking about.
She just starts digging around in the sand, where we all woke up?
translation.ja: 急に寝てた辺りを掘るの？

translation.en: "Oh, cool. Here's a first aid kit."
-Shit doesn't just happen. -So what are you saying?
translation.ja: 偶然じゃない 何だ？

translation.en: Where is she, by the way?
We split up, looking for stuff, like food and whatever.
translation.ja: 食べ物を探しに別れた

translation.en: I thought she'd be back here before me.
You know what, why don't we move down there, behind the rocks?
There's less wind, and we can build a real fire. The smoke can be a signal to people.
translation.ja: 風も少ないし火も起こせる煙で人を呼ぼう

translation.en: -Like a boat or a plane or something. -Who?
Why don't you grab this stuff, and we'll all go.
[Blair scoffs] Why? Who said he's the leader?
You collect the coconuts, all right?
You seem pretty good with the hatchet. Maybe we can use that to...
translation.ja: 斧が上手いからそれで…

translation.en: You two, if you guys carry on collecting the firewood...
translation.ja: そこの２人は薪を集めて…

translation.en: I just-- I think it's better if we work together as a team.
translation.ja: 一緒にがんばろう 了解

translation.en: Don't you fucking ever touch me again!
-You hear me? Don't you fucking ever-- -[Brody groans]
Don't you ever touch me again, or anybody here, do you hear me? Or I'll fucking kill you!
translation.ja: 誰かに触ったらね殺すわよ

translation.en: Let go of me. [panting] Did you tell 'em about the waterfall?
translation.ja: 放して滝の事は言った？

translation.en: -[Cooper] What waterfall? -All the things that we found? Did you?
translation.ja: 滝？ 発見した事 言ってない？

translation.en: Fresh water. A place to live.
translation.ja: 真水よ 生活の拠点

translation.en: But he wanted to call it our little secret.
At least that's what he said before he attacked me.
-Attacked you? -[Chase] Yes, attacked me, you liar!
translation.ja: 襲う？ そうよ　嘘つき

translation.en: She's the one who came on to me.

translation.ja: キスした このクソ…

translation.en: By the way, Donovan's dead. So maybe you should think about what's important here.
translation.ja: ドノヴァンは死んだ優先順位がある

translation.en: If someone attacked you, would you stop by and pick fruit for everyone straight after?
translation.ja: 襲われた後に果物狩りするか？

translation.en: go straight back to wherever and do something about it?
[chuckles] Oh! "Hey, got some bananas and mangoes,
and by the way, this guy over here, he attacked me."
-I mean, that's insane talk! -You fucking attacked me!
translation.ja: 変だろう？ 襲ったわ

translation.en: Don't touch me! Any of you!
[Hayden] This is crazy, right? All this?
I don't know. I have a bad feeling about this.
translation.ja: 何だろう嫌な予感がするわ

translation.en: -Stay with us, all right? -Shit! That's unreal!
He just grabbed me. Come on. Can you hear me?
[Cooper] The shark tore him up good.
Okay, we need to get the first aid kit. Somebody needs to go now--
translation.ja: 救急箱よ 早くして

translation.en: [Chase] Are you kidding me? It probably has Spider-Man Band-Aids. That's not gonna do anything.
translation.ja: バンソウコウしかないわ

translation.en: Here, I'll help you with his leg.
-[Donovan wails in pain] -[Hayden] I'll get the kit. -Put on a tourniquet. -[Chase] Let me help you.
Isn't that the guy that pushed you in front of the shark?
translation.ja: 足を持つ 盾にされたのよ

translation.en: -I don't know what to do. -We need to get him back.
translation.ja: どうする？ 連れて帰るから手伝って

translation.en: Okay, so I need everybody to get underneath him.
translation.ja: 連れて帰るから手伝って

translation.en: [Blair] Please, someone else can-- Taylor, can you come over here, please?
translation.ja: こっちもテイラーお願い

translation.en: [Chase] Get him back to the fire so he can stay warm.
Okay, so I'm gonna tell you when to lift him.
-We need to keep the wound raised. -[Cooper] Okay.
Two... Lift him really, really slowly and steadily, okay?
translation.ja: ２　ゆっくりよ 安全に

translation.en: [Blair] It's okay. It's okay. It's not long now.
Come on. Guys, fucking move it!
translation.ja: がんばって 早くして

translation.en: For what you did or lying about it?
more of a general type of thing.
I mean, it doesn't matter, but people are gonna...
Things are gonna get a lot worse out here before they get any better.
translation.ja: 今後は色々と危ないだろ

translation.en: You're smart, I know you can see that.
translation.ja: 君は賢いし理解してる

translation.en: We don't even know what's going on.
We don't have a clue how we woke up here.
translation.ja: なぜこの島に居るのか

translation.en: I just think that people need to... end up on the right side with each other before it's too late.
translation.ja: 今は皆が助け合わないとマズイ

translation.en: Before things start to go down or fall apart.
Look, that's all I wanted to say.
So, you just want me to forget the fact that you just jumped on me, held me down, and all that?
translation.ja: 私を押さえつけたことを忘れろと？

translation.en: Why? Because it's-- it's gonna get worse for me?
How much worse for me is it gonna get? I'm just curious.
translation.ja: 私の状況が悪化するの？

translation.en: the rest of them, they, uh...
So I told them that I'd come over here and tell you.
I hope you can join us.

translation.ja: どうかな 頼むよ 票が欲しい
頼むよ 票が欲しい

translation.en: Yeah, I got a couple ideas.
I'm sure the folks are gonna wanna put things to a vote at some point.
You know, I don't need you. You know that, right? I was just being nice.
translation.ja: 俺は１人でも平気だ優しくしただけ

translation.en: And they're also kinda worried about that, um...
Why don't you tell them that I'm holding it just in case you try to rape me again, you fucker?
translation.ja: レイプ対策だと伝えたら？

translation.en: And we all know what happens to him, don't we?
I wasn't trying to rape you.
There's no such thing like that in a place like this. There's just sex and no sex.
translation.ja: この状況ではセックスか否かだ

translation.en: I know it's a risk, but I think it's a risk worth taking.
Especially because we got someone who's injured.
I don't think we should move him.
Didn't know whether I should be here or not, but then I figured, hey,
translation.ja: 来るか迷ったんだけど

translation.en: you guys are all that I have, so, let this big council meeting begin.
translation.ja: 今は皆しか居ないから参加するわ

translation.en: We don't know why and we don't know how, but it's real.
translation.ja: 理由も方法も不明だが現実だ

translation.en: We can get sunburned or killed by shit in the water.
translation.ja: 日焼けや海の怪物も居る

translation.en: And we're gonna get hungry and thirsty.
All I'm proposing is that we all take a vote
to move off the beach to a little spot inland, where we have fresh water,
translation.ja: 真水のある内陸に行こう

translation.en: And where no one knows where we're at.
Face facts. We're out here on our own.
We have to have hope, right?
We're gonna die out here, without any shelter, out in the open.
translation.ja: 屋根もないしここに居ると死ぬ
天気も動物も感染症も

translation.en: I'll tell you what, I promise you this, we haven't seen half the shit this island's gonna throw at us.
translation.ja: 約束しよう今後もっと危険が来る

translation.en: That's a fact. We have to be ready.
-[chuckles] Wow. -We need to keep this fire going,
translation.ja: マジか 火を絶やさず食事と水を確保する

translation.en: take turns searching for food, getting water,
translation.ja: 火を絶やさず食事と水を確保する

translation.en: building a hut or two, and we survive.
translation.ja: 小屋も建てて生き抜く

translation.en: -Or we try to get out of here. -What are you gonna use for a boat?
maybe that cute little knife you got in your belt?
Why don't you try listening for once?
Do you have a piece of info that we don't have?
Why the hell would you say, "Get outta here"?
Do you guys know these two here? [Chase] This guy over here and this girl?
This is Mason and that's Hayden.
translation.ja: メイソンとヘイデンよ

translation.en: I saw them earlier, moving along the beach, in an odd way,
translation.ja: 変な歩き方で海岸を歩いてたわ

translation.en: like if they were counting steps or something.
-There's more to it, wasn't there? -Probably dumb, just forget it.
translation.ja: 教えてよ 忘れよう

translation.en: It was the number of steps... between each of us.
translation.ja: 私達の居た場所の間隔を計測した

translation.en: That's what we noticed. They were equidistant, all of them.
translation.ja: 私達の居た場所の間隔を計測した 等間隔だった

translation.en: When I kept finding things buried in the sand, first there was one, and then there was another.
translation.ja: 砂に埋まった物も次々に見つかった

translation.en: I mean, the rest I guessed, but they were all there.
It was 39 steps between each of us,
I tried to be as even as possible because it's not an exact unit of measurement, but...
translation.ja: 正確な単位じゃないけど

translation.en: Isn't that a movie or something? 39 Steps?
That probably doesn't have anything to do with this.
But that's the point here. We have to be open to what's around us.
translation.ja: 大事な事よ周囲をよく見ないと

translation.en: Try to remember things of our lives that would help us figure out what the hell all this means.
translation.ja: 記憶を呼び戻して全ての意味を探るの

translation.en: It could be something, it could be nothing,
We calculated the number of steps we had times the number of people that existed here. And then we followed that number.
translation.ja: 歩数と人の数を掛け算してその数だけ歩いた

translation.en: Yeah, since when did this become a math problem?
There's a guy dying over there. Can we please, please take a vote?
translation.ja: 彼は死にかけてる投票させてよ

translation.en: since it would be impossible to go out there and calculate steps in a credible way while swimming and--
translation.ja: 泳ぎながらでは歩数は分からないから

translation.en: we began taking a series of random samplings in terms of jungle and also in both directions on the beach,
translation.ja: ランダムで森と海岸を何回か計測した

translation.en: allowing for a size differential based on the biggest and smallest of us,
translation.ja: 皆の大きさの違いも考慮した
そしたら ビンゴだ

translation.en: eight. I just want to be sure.
[Chase] I really don't know if it was a good idea to leave him behind.
I was down this beach earlier, and I didn't even see it.
I mean, not that I was looking for it, but there it is, in plain English.
translation.ja: 普通に英語で書いてあるわ

translation.en: Yeah, it's a sign that's exactly the same amount of steps
translation.ja: そう標識よ 皆との距離を足した場所に“帰り道を見つけろ”

translation.en: as it is from the people that woke up on this island. It says, "Find your way back."
translation.ja: 皆との距離を足した場所に“帰り道を見つけろ”

translation.en: You know, this is actually bad news,
'cause whoever made this sign is gone, so they either figured something out or...
translation.ja: 作った奴は居ないから何か分かったか…

translation.en: It's not like it's magic. It's not even math.
translation.ja: 魔法でも数学でもない

translation.en: They just walked down the beach and found it. If they hadn't, someone else would've.
translation.ja: 歩いたら見つかった誰でも出来る

translation.en: Hey, it's cool, it's just not-- not a grocery store or ice cream.
translation.ja: スーパーかアイスがよかったよ

translation.en: We're hungry, and it's not even a map that tells us where we are.
translation.ja: 腹が減ったし地図でもない

translation.en: How do you know that that's not what this is?
-No, honestly, how do you know? -It's not. Look, it's a sign.
translation.ja: なぜ分かる？ 標識だ

translation.en: That's the point here, people! It's-- It's something. I know it is.
translation.ja: きっと何かあるはずよ

translation.en: I should go check on Donovan.
Does it say "find your way home"? It says "back." Back somewhere.
translation.ja: 標識は“帰り道を見つけろ”って

translation.en: -I just don't know where "where" is. -[Hayden] Who knows?
translation.ja: 分からないけど そうね

translation.en: Maybe they're right. It means nothing.
It could just be a sign.
An actual sign, left here by someone a long time ago
translation.ja: 大昔に誰かが置いたね

translation.en: [Mason] Do you think the numbers are just all chance?
